title: Boku Ga Shiranai Kimi No Kao
alternative_title: 僕が知らない君の顔 ; The face I never knew you had
status: 僕が知らない君の顔 ; The face I never knew you had
description:
Description :
        Aoba, a third-year university student, is living with his childhood friend Shou, who is one year younger than him. Except for the small apartment they share, their life together was quite comfortable, but one rainy day, Shou came home soaking wet and crying, and ever since then, Aoba can't get that crying face out of his head.
